page.title: 19Morriston Hospital(Contd.)
page.content: comfortable place. Fifteen hundred people now work at the hospital. Many new buildings are being constructed to make the hospital bigger and better. The new buildings will include a theatre, a casualty ward and rooms for occupational therapy and physiotherapy. The new casualty ward will open in November, 1985. Some people are upset because there are plans to close the casualty ward at Singleton Hospital, Swansea which will mean many people wil have much further to go for treatment. The concern of local people has featured heavily in the newspaper. Each year the hospital has a carnival to raise money to make life for the patients more comfortable. This year they had a fete instead. Next year they will have a carnival again because the fete was less successful.
